events.question: You're the jerk who is responsible for the fall of [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Castle[/color], right?

events.text: I always knew you were a jerk!

Give it up, buttercup.
You really assume us dead people were born YESTERDAY?
That's crazy.

Anyway, since I have your ear... you fell for Boggle's charms like a dunce!
Archdemon Boggle is only in this game to fool around, okay?
I wanted to let you know that there is a way to fix things.
By any chance did you see our former [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon[/color] is currently imprisoned?
If you even care at all... [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon[/color] Maldoror can help you find missing mortals.
Archdemon Boggle can't help you... at all. Can't even help itself!

events.question: Sooo... do you pledge allegiance to [color=#08ff00]Our Lady of Slumbers,[/color] Princess Coldheart?

events.text:
Foul Necromancer! We don't need your help anyway.
May you rot and reek like a Necromancer's Underpants for the rest of your days!

events.choice: I do. I'll make things right.

events.text:
FABULOUS!!!!! It's good to have you on board.
Now this [color=#08ff00]Operation Coldheart[/color] mission is more simple than you think.
We need to trick the [color=#ff0000]Curious Serpent[/color] into causing a major distraction outside the Keep.
"But how do I do this, fair Myth?" You may ask. It's easy. Don't worry.
You must give the [color=#ff0000]Curious Serpent[/color] food poisoning. Non-lethal, of course. Ha!
What you choose to feed to the [color=#ff0000]Curious Serpent[/color] is up to you. I leave it to your discretion.
Now fly, Foul Necromancer! Serve the [color=#ff0000]Curious Serpent[/color] its last meal!
